Service Details: - Helps adults with developmental disabilities and transitioning youth with special needs and their families have access to supports and services that are available- The Advocate can help with services from the Ministry of Social Development and Social Innovation, from other ministries, Community Living BC or from service agencies in the community- Helps resolve complaints and encourages adults to advocate for themselves when individuals do like the services they are getting, are not being treated fairly or with respect, do not agree with a decision that was made, or if they have questions about eligibility and funding of services
Eligibility: Adults with developmental disabilities and transitioning youth with special needs and their families
